{"id":435234183,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 5 months","timestamp":1609094490,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"28 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/435234183/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Median of Two Sorted Arrays","memory":"89.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    double findMedianSortedArrays(vector<int>& nums1, vector<int>& nums2) {\n        int cntr = 0;\n        int m = nums1.size();\n        int n = nums2.size();\n        int a = (n+m)/2  , b = (n+m)/2 -1; \n        double A,B;\n        for(int i = 0 , j = 0; cntr < n + m; cntr++){\n            if(cntr>a)break;\n            if(j==n){\n                if(cntr==b)B = nums1[i];\n                if(cntr==a)A = nums1[i];\n                i++;continue;\n            }\n            if(i==m){\n               if(cntr==b)B = nums2[j];\n                if(cntr==a)A = nums2[j];j++;continue;\n            }\n            if(nums1[i]>nums2[j]){\n                if(cntr==b)B = nums2[j];\n                if(cntr==a)A = nums2[j];\n                j++;\n            }\n            else {\n               if(cntr==b)B = nums1[i];\n                if(cntr==a)A = nums1[i];i++;\n            }\n        }\n        double C=0.0;\n        if((n+m) % 2){\n            \n            return {A};\n        }\n        else {\n            C = (A+B)/2.0;\n            return {C};\n        }\n    }\n    \n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"median-of-two-sorted-arrays"}
